unnormalised: Hey everyone, any news on Bumrah's injury? Hope he's back soon, maybe before the Ind vs. Pak match! Heard Dhawan bhai pulled a hamstring. Recover soon paaji! Remember the movie "Chak De! India"? We need that spirit! The physios at NCA must be working overtime. Wishing them a speedy recovery for all the players. Jai Hind!
normalised: Hey everyone, any news on Bumrah's injury? Hope he is back soon, maybe before the India versus Pakistan match! Heard Dhawan bhai pulled a hamstring. Recover soon paaji! Remember the movie "Chak De! India"? We need that spirit! The physios at N C A must be working overtime. Wishing them a speedy recovery for all the players. Jai Hind!
